title: Memes & Games Sub-Board Rules Update
body:
Hey M&G! 

Redirect you nice folk to a thread on Discuss the Boards dealing with the upcoming rules updates for M&G. If you want to take a peek at them and leave some feedback, it would be appreciated by the Moderation Team. 

> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/j5HvaVxK-memesgames-sub-board-update
